WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING, will enable webhooks, when in env mode

TOKEN.description: Your Bot Token, as a String. Get it from @BotFather on Telegram

API_ID.description: Your Telegram Account's API ID. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram Account's API HASH. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

APP_NAME.description: Your Heroku App Name, that you just entered at the Top of the page

HEROKU_API.description: Your Heroku Account's API KEY. Get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account/

SUPPORT.description: Your Bot's Support Channel, that you want the users to join in order to use your Session Generator. Make sure that you don't put @ in it

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Your Bot's Support Group, where the users can join and bother you about bugs/errors in the Session Generator. Make sure that you don't put @ in it
